Employment Type: Full-time

	We are dedicated to providing affordable housing solutions and lucrative investment opportunities.
	With a strong presence nationwide, we pride ourselves on excellence, integrity, and customer satisfaction.

	Schedule regular follow up with customers to ensure they are satisfied
	Act as point of contact for complaints and escalate issues as appropriate

title: Business Development Manager Job at Kiyix Recruitment Hub
content:
Kiyix Recruitment Hub - Our client, a growing financial institution providing structured credit solutions to individuals and small businesses in Lagos.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Development Manager

Job Location: Surulere, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	The Business Development Manager will originate business, manage relationships, and support institutional development, focusing on lending opportunities, funding mobilization, and growth initiatives.


Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Originate lending opportunities and manage relationships
	Mobilize funding and support strategic partnerships
	Execute growth initiatives and provide market insights
	Ensure regulatory compliance and internal controls


Requirements


	3-5 years of experience in business development, lending, or related roles
	Strong business origination and relationship management skills
	Knowledge of lending products, credit processes, and funding structures
	Commercial judgment and risk management.


Compensation
Net salary of N300,000, with equity/stock options.

Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: chinenye.kiyix@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.    

    

        Click here to Apply
